title: Simone Biles, now the most decorated gymnast In World Championship history
text:
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Simone Biles (@simonebiles) on Oct 11, 2019 at 4:52am PDT

American artistic gymnast Simone Arianne Biles, individual all-around, vault, and floor gold medalist, and balance beam bronze medalist at the 2016 Olympics, has just set a new record!





View this post on Instagram A post shared by Simone Biles (@simonebiles) on Jul 23, 2019 at 5:37pm PDT

As of the 2019 World Championships, this gymnast has won most World medals (25) and most World gold medals (19) of any gender! Biles is also the female gymnast with the most World all-around titles–she is a five-time World All-around Champion (2013–15, 2018–19), a five-time World Floor Exercise Champion (2013–15, 2018-19), a three-time World Balance Beam Champion (2014–15, 2019), and a two-time World Vault Champion (2018-19). But what makes Biles’ accomplishments all the more special? The fact that male gymnasts compete in up to eight events at world championships while women compete in only six!





View this post on Instagram A post shared by Simone Biles (@simonebiles) on Oct 13, 2019 at 5:35pm PDT

Biles saw a splendid week at the world championships last week in Stuttgart, Germany. On Tuesday, she led her team to their fifth consecutive gold medal in the competition, also becoming the most decorated woman with 21 medals. But just two days later, she cruised to a first-place finish by an impressive margin of 2.1 points in the all-around event. And that wasn't all; on Saturday, she claimed the gold in the vault, winning the floor exercise by a full point, tying her position with Belarusian men's gymnast Vitaly Scherbo. Her 25th medal came two hours later with her near-flawless routine on the beam with 15.066 points.





View this post on Instagram A post shared by Simone Biles (@simonebiles) on Aug 12, 2019 at 9:06am PDT
description: Simone Arianne Biles breaks all-time record for most medals by any gymnast of any gender at world championships.
